title: Chinna Chinna Vanna Kuyil Song Lyrics Mouna Ragam
stanzas:
Chinna Chinna Vanna Kuyil Song Lyrics Mouna Ragam
#Ilaiyaraja #SJanaki #Vaali

Chinna chinna vanna kuyil
konji konji koovuthammaa
puriyaadha aanandham
pudhithaaga arambam

puriyaadha aanandham
pudhithaaga arambam
poothaadum thaen mottu
naanaa naanaa

Chinna chinna vanna kuyil
konji konji koovuthammaa

Mannavan paerai solli
malligai soodi kondaen.
manmadhan padal ondru
nenjukul paadi kondaen.

Maenikkul kaattru vandhu
mellaathaan aada kandaen.
mangaikkul kadhal vellam
gangai pol oda kandaen.

Chinna chinna vanna kuyil
konji konji koovuthammaa
puriyaadha aanandham
pudhithaaga arambam

puriyaadha aanandham
pudhithaaga arambam
poothaadum thaen mottu
naanaa naanaa

Chinna chinna vanna kuyil
konji konji koovuthammaa
